synopsis.text: Masaki Michishita, an average prep school student, finds his mundane life taking an unexpected turn when he dashes to a park restroom and crosses paths with the captivating auto mechanic, Takakazu Abe. As their eyes meet, Abe proposes an enticing invitation that Michishita, with his affinity for attractive men, finds impossible to resist. Thus, the duo embarks on an extraordinary journey, ignited by a brief wrestling match and fueled by an undeniable connection. This tale of intrigue and attraction promises to captivate audiences as they follow Michishita and Abe's thrilling encounters.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
